amendment.description: To clarify certain cost-sharing requirements applicable to awards from the Energy Technology Commercialization Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2980 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2980 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Heinrich to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4333) To clarify certain cost-sharing requirements applicable to awards from the Energy Technology Commercialization Fund.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2980 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2980 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Heinrich to Amendment SA 2910.
